mapper.insert: INSERT INTO full_details ( live_score_id, t, s, x, y, q, attribute ) VALUES (#{live_score_id}, #{t}, #{s}, #{x}, #{y}, #{q}, #{attribute} )
INSERT INTO half_time_details ( live_score_id, t, s, x, y, q, attribute ) VALUES (#{live_score_id}, #{t}, #{s}, #{x}, #{y}, #{q}, #{attribute} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM live_score where is_resolved = #{is_resolved} ORDER BY id desc

select count(1) FROM (SELECT f.id, f.realid, f.t, f.s, f.x, f.y, f.q, f.su, f.av, f.attribute FROM full_details f WHERE f.live_score_id = #{live_score_id} AND f.attribute = 0 Union select fd.id, fd.realid, fd.t, fd.s, fd.x, fd.y, fd.q, fd.su, fd.av, fd.attribute from half_time_details fd inner join (SELECT realid,su,max(a) FROM (SELECT realid,su,count(1) as a FROM full_details WHERE live_score_id = #{live_score_id} AND attribute = 0 GROUP BY realid,su ) AS T GROUP BY T.realid) as TT on fd.live_score_id = #{live_score_id} AND fd.attribute = 0 and fd.realid = TT.realid AND fd.su = TT.su ) as TTT

select count(1) FROM (SELECT f.id, f.realid, f.t, f.s, f.x, f.y, f.q, f.su, f.av, f.attribute FROM half_time_details f WHERE f.live_score_id = #{live_score_id} AND f.attribute = 0 Union select fd.id, fd.realid, fd.t, fd.s, fd.x, fd.y, fd.q, fd.su, fd.av, fd.attribute from half_time_details fd inner join (SELECT realid,su,max(a) FROM (SELECT realid,su,count(1) as a FROM half_time_details WHERE live_score_id = #{live_score_id} AND attribute = 0 GROUP BY realid,su ) AS T GROUP BY T.realid) as TT on fd.live_score_id = #{live_score_id} AND fd.attribute = 0 and fd.realid = TT.realid AND fd.su = TT.su ) as TTT
